segments.text: The little boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m scared he’s going to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and his sister is just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; it’s too dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she’s not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would turn off that faucet before the floor gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to the stool, and it’s already slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
